### `49`

```

```

### `49: formatted`

```tsx
things.reduce(
	function(collection, thing) {
		return collection.concat(<Hello key={thing.id} />);
	},
	[],
);

```

### `50`

```

```

### `50: formatted`

```tsx
things.reduceRight(
	(collection, thing) => collection.concat(<Hello key={thing.id} />),
	[],
);

```

### `51`

```

```

### `51: formatted`

```tsx
things.reduceRight(
	function(collection, thing) {
		return collection.concat(<Hello key={thing.id} />);
	},
	[],
);

```
